history.proof: intros L p Hin. unfold red. induction L. - simpl in Hin. contradiction. - hauto lq: on drew: off use: app_nil_end, cb_redacc.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros L p Hin. unfold red. induction L. - simpl in Hin. contradiction. - simpl. destruct (zerop_dec a). + apply IHL. + apply cb_redacc. * left. reflexivity. * apply cb_comp with (p :: redacc L nil). ++ intros q Hq. apply cb_comp with (a :: nil). ** intros r Hr. inversion Hr. subst. apply cb_nf. ** apply cb_redacc. right. apply Hq. ++ apply cb_incl. apply incl_tl, incl_cons. apply incl_refl. apply cb_nf. apply nf_cb.
